title: Best Bits with Amy: PART 1
itunes:title: Best Bits with Amy: PART 1
description:
In this podcast, Morgan and Amy answered some random, fun questions about dumb injuries, their favorite Disney characters, and the person they’d want to trade lives with for a day. They share their favorite pumpkin flavored items from this season, and they each had a 5/5 recommendation for something to watch. Morgan confessed something that triggered her on the Bobby Bones Show Facebook page and Amy shared a sweet story about the favorite item she got from a celebrity.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
